attributes.action: our children should not be made to go back to schools
attributes.additional_details: dont use our children as guinea pigs , let them stay safe at home until parliament can all sit next to each other safely so Parliament shows us its safe by all taking their seat next to each other !
attributes.background: Parliament are showing us it is still unsafe to be near each other by not having their meetings in parliament sat next to each other so why do they feel they can make our children return to school before its safe

rejection.details:
We think this petition is similar:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/319292
